node.title: ITWI 1
node.content:
This section of the website is only for the benefit of the ITWI 1 course participants ONLY. Please do not share the links from this section of the website. Also, please refrain from sharing the videos shared in this section.

This is the best solution we have to make things less complicated and we strongly hope that you will comply with the above mentioned guidelines.

Thank you.

 

 

ITWI 1 – News Section

Latest News:

12/09/2012:

  • The feedback form for the 3rd lecture by Dr. Tahir Hameed Tanoli is available now, please click the link on the menu (right) to fill the form
  • The feedback form for the 4th lecture by Dr. Moeen Nizami is available now, please click the link on the menu (right) to fill the form
  • Since YouTube is currently blocked in Pakistan, we are looking for an alternate to upload the video of the 3rd and the 4th lecture.
  • Pictures of 3rd lecture by Dr. Tahir Hameed Tanoli are available here: https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.481528811865433.113809.452791544739160&type=1
  • Pictures of 4th lecture by Dr. Moeen Nizami are available here: https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.484163491601965.114512.452791544739160&type=1

 


 

News Archives:

12/09/2012:

  • Video of the second lecture by Dr. Moeen Nizami is available now. Please click on the link on the right menu to watch the video
  • Video of the first lecture by Dr. Javed Iqbal is available now. Please click on the link on the right menu to watch the video
  • Feedback form for the second lecture is available in the right menu now. Please click the link to give us your feedback.
  • If you haven’t filled up the “Help us know your batter….” form yet, please fill it now. The link is available in the menu
  • If you haven’t filled up the “Feedback – Lecture 1” form yet, please fill it now. The link is available in the menu

Lectures in Pictures

  • Lecture 1: https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.476973535654294.112636.452791544739160&type=1
  • Lecture 2: https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.478907455460902.113124.452791544739160&type=1

Upcoming Lecture – 3rd Lecture

  • The third lecture of the first module will be delivered by Dr. Tahir Hameed Tanoli (Asst. Director Iqbal Academy Pakistan) on coming Saturday. The topic of his talk is اقبال کی ملی، قومی اہمیت اور سیاسی و تاریخی کردار. We expect you to arrive for the lecture at 4:30 for the administrative stuff and the lecture will start at 5PM sharp insha Allah.
